website_summaries.verdict: The super-automatic Krups EA9010 might be stunningly expensive but it's sure to please the well-heeled who crave great espresso and cafe drinks delivered at the push of a button.
pros: The Krups EA9010 creates excellent shots of straight espresso and quality steamed milk cafe drinks almost entirely on its own
It also has a built-in burr grinder to process whole beans to order, accepts pre-ground coffee, and cleans itself as much as possible
cons: Besides being saddled with a rockstar price tag, the Krups EA9010's lack of fully manual controls will disappoint home barista hobbyists
Even though the EA9010 is a super-automatic espresso machine, it still requires frequent emptying of its drips trays and occasional deep hands-on cleaning

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy, not reliable
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy one, nothing but problems. Each time it has to go in for repairs it's gone for 3 to 4 weeks, and it goes in often. Not worth the money and is a constant source of aggravation. Not a reliable machine.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Repair needed at 3 months
customer_reviews.text: Great coffee and love the drink recipes, but the unit required to go in for repair at 3 months old. It has taken a solid week, just for the shipping box to arrive when they promised a total 5 business days turn time repair from the VIP hotline.
customer_reviews.author: B. Pradel

customer_reviews.title: The cappuccino frothing stopped working
customer_reviews.text: The cappuccino frothing stopped working during the warranty and I had to return the machine twice for repair. The repair service center took 3 weeks to repair it
customer_reviews.author: NM

customer_reviews.title: Have been using this machine daily for two months, ...
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this machine daily for two months, no complaints so far. Both the espresso drinks and the regular coffee are OUTSTANDING. The fully-automatic milk steaming is the coolest thing.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Purchased 2016
customer_reviews.text: We have used this for several years without issue. Use it all the time - Zero issues

customer_reviews.title: Best coffee/espresso machine there is!
customer_reviews.text: Best bean to coffee machine out there. No problems at all after 3 months
customer_reviews.author: Richard A. Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Not worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: What a pain in the neck this machine was. We ended up returning it after a few days. First of all you spend more time adding water and going through cleaning and maintenance cycles then making espresso or cappuccino. Second, we had an issue with the o-ring coming off on the lid for the coffee beans. We called the company, and got the run around. You would think that first a $2000 plus machine you would get excellent customer support. NOPE! Back she went
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The product was delivered as ordered and I love it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Karen D. King

customer_reviews.title: Alot of money
customer_reviews.text: No problem with the seller. My review is based on having the machine for 2 years and I'm ready to throw it out the window. Had to send it several times for repairs to krups for same issues over and over. Also no one works on them! Hard to find Repair local center.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Greek Guy

customer_reviews.title: if you love coffee, this is the best automated barista you ...
customer_reviews.text: Hands down, if you love coffee, this is the best automated barista you can buy. The only things you have to do are add beans, water, empty the drip pan and empty the coffee grounds. The espresso taste like true Italian and the range of drink options are great.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel James

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Good delivery ..Excellent machine. Easy to use and coffee is hot. Just two points one is that it came with European instead of USA/Canada manual and it is difficult to understand the steps to clean the heating wand manually. I would recommend to everyone that enjoys a good cup of hot coffee
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looking For Coffee in all the right places.
customer_reviews.text: Great machine. Does everything automatic. Kind of expensive, but do not have to visit Starbucks every day.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Massarotto

customer_reviews.title: ******do not buy**** Do not buy after 25 days got ...
customer_reviews.text: ******do not buy**** Do not buy after 25 days got stock on automatic rinsing I could not do anything Called kroups customer service they couldn’t help me they say software problem and I should return as defect .to many moving parts too expensive. thank god for amazon
customer_reviews.author: gabby

customer_reviews.title: Oily beans will cause problems.
customer_reviews.text: MOST IMPORTANT THING ABOUT EA9000: Using oily beans (most Starbucks coffees) will cause several bad things to happen. Grinder gunks up and fails to grind enough beans. Drain to tray clogs and causes backup and total system stop. Other tubes clog. Using medium DRY, NON-OILY beans along with proper maintenance should improve your experience.
customer_reviews.author: Rocky

customer_reviews.title: Money saver!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this KRUPS Cappuccino Machine. It has saved me so much money and time. I can make my favorite coffee house drinks at home in my pjs instead of loading up my two young children and heading over to the coffee shop. I've had family over who are amazed at the quality of coffee that I can make and I'm by no means an experienced coffee maker. But with the push of a few buttons I can make coffee that rivals their favorite coffee shops. My whole family would love to have this machine as well.
customer_reviews.author: JACLYN

customer_reviews.title: Great Cappucino Maker
customer_reviews.text: I really like this cappucino maker. It is easy to use, easy clean up but most importantly I like the cappucino this machine makes it's really good. I would recommend this cappucino maker if you are a cappucino lover as I am...you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: purple1

customer_reviews.title: Krups Barista is a Lemon
customer_reviews.text: Don't ever think about buying this coffee maker. We had it repaired three times and then they finally replace it. Even with the new one we had to have it repaired and now the warranty is over so can't get it fixed anymore. Despite running all required rinsing and cleaning cycles the coffee machine gets blocked and no coffee is coming out. Maybe one of three attempts are successful, essentially wasting 2/3 of the coffee beans that go through the machine. Also, the Krups customer care team is not very helpful, unpleasant people to deal with. Buyers beware, stay away from Krups.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: KRUPS Barista
customer_reviews.text: The KRUPS cappuccino machine was very easy to put together and set up was a breeze. I like the placements of the machine and its commodities as they are very useful and handy. I made a cappuccino on the first go and the machine itself walks you through the process on the handy touchscreen and it even comes with its own handy cups. The functionality was very simple my 9 y/o used it to prepare my morning cup before I got out of bed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed. We have tried our usual Peets coffee in this, and a second one, both taste very bitter from this machine. The frothed milk is cold on top, and I have to stand and push buttons for longer than our old simple coffeemaker took to make a whole pot. i like my old milk frother and coffee maker better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Automatic Espresso Machine...No a Great Barista for a perfect cup of coffee
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a while to find the perfect automatic Cappuccino Machine. I looked no further, this machine is perfect. Easy to set up, easy to maintain and easy to make a perfect barista style coffee. The enclosed documentation guides you on set up. Once your set up is complete the easy to follow touch screen display will prompt you to a perfect cup of coffee. Oh by he way the coffee is delicious. I recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: malaprop

customer_reviews.title: Does everything you want from a super automatic and more.
customer_reviews.text: The widest range of coffee drinks I've seen and really no touch operation for cleaning other than emptying the trays and filling the water and beans. The quality of the coffee is second to none. I've owned the comparable Gaggia and Miele versions and this is by far my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Phil Peterman

product_meta.title: KRUPS EA9010 Fully Auto Cappuccino Machine Espresso Maker, Automatic Rinsing, Two Step Milk Frothing Technology, 57 Ounce, Silver
product_meta.description: Prepare your drinks like a professional Barista thanks to the EA9010 full-automatic espresso machine which offers the most black and white cup recipes on the market. The one-touch full color digital screen offers 12 recipes at the touch of a button. The Favorites menu offers the possibility to customize up to 8 different drinks on up to 8 different profiles. Adjustable coffee dispenser heights accommodate different cup sizes and the advance automatic 2-step frothing technology makes the perfect cappuccino, every time.
feature_bullets: FULLY AUTOMATIC: Cappuccino machine offers powerful performance — from even grinding to proper heating; includes metal conical-burr grinder (with auto grinder setting and manual option), Thermo Block heating system, and 15 bar high-pressure pump

ONE-TOUCH DIGITAL SCREEN WITH 17 RECIPES: Make easy selections with the touch of a button; choose from espressos, lattes, cappuccinos, and more; fully customizable — from programming of favorites and profile to preferred drink strength
AUTOMATIC ADJUSTMENTS: Adjusts automatically (quantity of coffee, grinding fineness, water temperature) according to selected recipe to ensure the best results for every option
2-STEP FROTHING: Automatically froths milk in 2 steps for making delicious milk-based coffee drinks like a pro; automatic steam-nozzle cleaning for ultimate convenience

USER-FRIENDLY DESIGN: 100% frontal operation for easy access to key functions; compact size with 8.8 oz. coffee bean container and 56 oz. / 1.7 L. water tank; Claris water filtration system; no need to ever clean inside of unit

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars63 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
